Posts.EditableText:
I'm trying to write a procedure where an animated gif pops up, but when it runs, the program locks up.  Regular images have appeared with no problem.  The gif file size is about 670kb.
I've tried doing this with specifying the window size and without, but it locked up both ways.
Any suggestions?
Thanks!
